thread.title: India Tourism Development Corporation welcomes new director
thread.title_full: India Tourism Development Corporation welcomes new director

author: eTN Editor
title: India Tourism Development Corporation welcomes new director
text:
India Tourism Development Corporation welcomes new director Adv: 
By Anil Mathur, eTN India Corresponden | Jul 31, 2015 Piyush Tiwari Adv: 
A new Director, Commercial and Marketing, for the India Tourism Development Corporation (ITDC), has taken over. ITDC runs the Ashok Group of Hotels.
